author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-LSB Industries Inc. Announces Pricing Of Its $400 Million Private Offering Of Senior Notes
text:
LSB Industries Inc:
* LSB INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF ITS $400 MILLION PRIVATE OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES
* LSB INDUSTRIES INC - PRICED ITS PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED OFFERING OF $400 MILLION IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2023
* LSB INDUSTRIES INC - NOTES WILL BEAR AN ANNUAL RATE OF INTEREST OF 9.625% AND WILL MATURE ON MAY 1, 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
